did.unittitle: Xavier University Department of Biology records
did.abstract: This is a small collection of materials either generated by or written about the Biology Department at Xavier University.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This small collection chiefly includes some correspondence from the Chairs of the Biology Department and also some brochures or faculty publications for that department.

arrangement.head: Statement of Arrangement
arrangement.p: This small collection is arranged into two folders. Folder one has correspondence, while folder two includes brochures and faculty publications.
